Scene_Dialogs.dialog_text: Good morning ma'am. Hope you had a nice night of sleep.
Ehm... Sorry for not minding my own bussiness but, can I ask you why did you leave your home country?
*Why can't you keep your old mouth shut for just one minute?*
It's kind of a long story.... But I need to run away. The government was persecuting everyone who opposed the president.
I'm so... so sorry to hear that ma'am. I didn't mean to cause you any discomfort.
Not at all! Actually, I'm here because I'm traveling to another city to see my family.
I saved enough money to take them out of our country. I'm finally going to see them after many years of waiting.
Those are great news! I hope everything goes fine with you and your family.
You know what sir? Here, take my scarf. I want you to keep it as a gift...
Now I need to rush to see my family. See you soon!
*I think at the end, it's not too hot*
